appearance: brown backpack, red sweater, grey jeans docs, skateboard
name: David Russell
notes: is a singer, friends with the people that works here, heading to wash later to shoot some film and polaroids, going to spain in july (trip is 2 grand), going with his girlfriend's family, ibiza, never been to europe, 5-day work week, get his days off consecutively, made 7grand in january, had 10 shots of whiskey and 2 margaritas at a party a few days ago, “living the best live ive ever been”, broke up with his girlfriend a while ago (2 weeks?), was really upset about it, courtney (girlfriend's name)

order: used to work here as a barista
notes: got late lunch with Daniel, went to florence, Justin was asking where she got euros, will be in Chicago next week, coming in to Dreamers to work for a weekend 10/11a – 2/3p, used to live around the neighborhood
